summary: Jewellery Order Management System (KarigarFlow) with authentication, dashboard, and multi-tab interface - currently experiencing authentication loop and UI visibility issues
architectural_notes: Authentication flow: login → profile loading → dashboard navigation
Multi-tab interface with dashboard and other data views
User authentication and profile management system
Beige patterned background causing UI contrast issues
known_issues: Authentication loop: app gets stuck on 'Loading your profile...' and redirects back to login instead of reaching dashboard
Black UI problem: black text on beige/tan patterned background makes all content invisible and unreadable
Authentication state management cycling between loading and logout states incorrectly

existing_features.title: Fix the authentication loop where after Internet Identity login, the app gets stuck on 'Loading your profile...' and redirects back to the login screen instead of reaching the dashboard. The authentication state should properly complete login, load the user profile, and navigate to the role-appropriate dashboard (admin/staff/karigar) without cycling between loading and logout states.

Fix the UI visibility problem where all screens appear with black text on a beige/tan patterned background, making all content invisible and unreadable. Implement proper high-contrast color scheme with readable text colors, visible buttons, clear data displays, and appropriate backgrounds throughout the entire application so users can view data and access all app features.
